message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Considering its value to you, I propose a price of $950000 for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $850000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a proposal that might better suit your budget. I am offering the product for $900000. This price still reflects the value of the product while allowing for a more flexible arrangement.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In light of your latest offer, I am proposing a price of $925000 for the product. This price still maintains a high level of value for the product while being more accessible to your budget.

I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $890000 for the product. This price is reflective of my budget while still acknowledging the value of the product.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I am willing to consider your most recent offer. I am proposing a price of $910000 for the product, which I believe strikes a good balance between the value of the product and your budget constraints.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a price of $885000 for the product.

I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I am proposing a price of $905000 for the product. This price aims to maintain a fair valuation while accommodating your budgetary considerations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I have carefully considered all the offers and I am willing to propose a final price of $895000 for the product.
